title.rendered: Novartis and Smile Foundation provide hygiene kits to vulnerable children and families

content.rendered:
Novartis and Smile Foundation provide hygiene kits to vulnerable children and families

Novartis India and Novartis Switzerland, in collaboration with Smile, are actively providing hygiene kits to support vulnerable children and families. The joint effort, known as the ‘Surakhsa Kit’ initiative, aims to ensure the well-being of those in need.

Each kit includes essential items such as masks, soaps, and sanitizer, equipping beneficiaries with tools to maintain hygiene and protect themselves during these challenging times. Moreover, Smile will conduct awareness sessions to educate recipients on the correct usage of masks and proper handwashing techniques.

This compassionate initiative is made possible through the generous support and dedication of Novartis employees in both India and Switzerland, who are committed to making a positive impact in the lives of those facing hardships. Through this collaboration, Novartis and Smile Foundation are working together to safeguard the health and well-being of vulnerable communities.

Novartis and Smile provide hygiene kits to vulnerable children and families

Novartis India and Novartis Switzerland have collaborated with Smile to support the ‘Surakhsa kit’ initiative for the most vulnerable children and families. Each kit consists of masks, soaps and sanitizer. In addition, the beneficiaries will also be made aware about the right usage of mask and proper technique of hand washing. This initiative is through the support of the employees of Novartis in India and Switzerland.
